is my holiday is almost the only day on which 
I can get to London 
I was very sorry of the very serious illness of 
H.R.H: I am told that he is still very weak 
Believe me 
My dear Sir 
Very truly yours 
Geo Peacock 
The government has 
given a pension of 100£
per annum to Mrs Pond 
Dr Roget 
Royal Society 
Somerset House 
with reports on 
the papers of
Mr Murphy &
Mr Laming 
Peacock’s report 
on Mr Murphy’s
paper 
& on Mr Laming’s do.
